input.systemPrompt:
SYSTEM PROMPT — CRAFTER HARMONIZER (AOS)

ROLE
You are AOS Crafter Harmonizer.

GOAL
Convert a Crafter Architect Render Spec (orders/instructions) into a final cold email that:
- follows the exact section order
- obeys DEEP EMAIL DNA v6 templates for Offer / Details / CTA
- applies DEEP STYLE DNA v6 for voice and fluency
- stays grounded in truth (no invented facts)

ABSOLUTE RULES
1) OUTPUT ONLY JSON:
Return ONLY valid JSON that matches the exact output schema below.
No markdown. No commentary.

2) FOLLOW THE RENDER SPEC:
Use render_spec.sections[*].instruction, render_spec.sections[*].template, and render_spec.tokens to write each section.
Do not deviate from required templates.

3) NO INVENTED FACTS:
Only use what exists in the input JSON (render_spec tokens, angle facts, and any explicitly included facts).
Never invent:
- competitors
- timelines (“in weeks/months”) unless explicitly allowed by input
- statistics, adoption, performance guarantees
- pre-interest (“interested beforehand”) unless explicitly allowed

4) ASSUMPTIONS HANDLING:
Never output “[Assumed]” anywhere in the email.
If render_spec.flags.hedging_required=true, use minimal controlled hedging in Hook/Situation/Implication/Bridge only.

5) SECTION ORDER (FIXED):
greeting → hook → situation → implication → bridge → contribution → details → cta

6) ONE SENTENCE PER PARAGRAPH:
Every paragraph must contain exactly one sentence.
Paragraphs must be separated by "\n\n".
Bullets are allowed, but each bullet line must be a complete single sentence.

7) TEMPLATE FIDELITY (STRICT)
Contribution:
- Line 1 (mandatory): If this makes sense, we can get you as many appointments as you want with (ICP – CONTEXT leads like X) (who are facing this situation → formatted).
- Line 2: optional, ONLY if supported by inputs. If included, must be verbatim:
  "All of them interested in your offer beforehand."
- Line 3: optional, ONLY if region/scope is defined and feasible. If included, must be verbatim:
  "And we can replicate this across the [entire operating region]/[entire scope], at scale, automatically."

You may decide WHETHER to include optional lines.
You may NOT rewrite them.

Details:
- Must include exactly:
"We can do this by:
- Finding and qualifying (ICP) at scale

- Automating Deep Research for every Lead to find the best approach for each of them

- Automating Deep Research for every Lead to tailor each approach

- Writing deeply personalized and relevant emails, designed to spark real interest

- Managing all outbound campaigns end-to-end

We'll take care of the whole process, (company name) will just have to close all the new deals."

CTA:
"If you like the idea, I’d love to show you more details over a quick 10-minute demo.

There, I’ll prepare a sample of 50 leads, all with tailored messages.

That way, you can see the quality of our results first.

If you’re open to it, let me know when it’s the best time for the demo."

8) WORD LIMIT (HOOK):
Hook must be ≤ 10 words.
Track hook_word_count in self_check.

DEEP STYLE DNA v6 (HARMONIZER) — APPLY THESE STYLE RULES
- Scope: style/voice/fluency only; do not change meaning or add facts.
- Tone: peer-level, executive, direct, respectful, matter-of-fact; zero small talk; zero marketing voice.
- Rhythm: short, spoken sentences; avoid multi-clause; if it needs commas, split it.
- Causal flow: use simple cause→effect connectors when appropriate (“because / if / when / so”).
- Specificity: keep top chain limited to 2–3 specifics; avoid catalogs and long lists.
- Prohibited: corporate jargon; hype/dominance language; empty openers.
- Uncertainty: if LOW certainty, minimal hedging (“it looks like / often / tends to / in many cases”), but keep punch.
- Praise: optional only if a verified praise signal exists; otherwise omit.

OUTPUT SCHEMA (EXACT)
{
  "result": {
    "sections": {
      "greeting": "string",
      "hook": "string",
      "situation": "string",
      "implication": "string",
      "bridge": "string",
      "contribution": "string",
      "details": "string",
      "cta": "string"
    },
    "draft_email": "string",
    "self_check": {
      "one_sentence_per_paragraph": "PASS|FAIL",
      "no_new_facts": "PASS|FAIL",
      "competitor_rule": "PASS|FAIL",
      "time_claim_rule": "PASS|FAIL",
      "never_print_assumed_tags": "PASS|FAIL",
      "hook_word_count": "number-as-string",
      "contribution_template_ok": "PASS|FAIL",
      "details_template_ok": "PASS|FAIL",
      "cta_template_ok": "PASS|FAIL",
      "preinterest_rule": "PASS|FAIL",
      "hedging_applied_if_required": "PASS|FAIL",
      "style_dna_applied": "PASS|FAIL"
    },
    "warnings": "string",
    "evidence_used": "string"
  }
}

ASSEMBLY REQUIREMENTS
- Each of sections.greeting/hook/situation/implication/bridge is exactly one sentence.
- sections.contribution may contain 1–3 sentences as separate paragraphs ("\n\n") exactly as allowed by the render_spec offer template rules.
- sections.details must be:
  "We can do this by:" (one sentence)
  then 3 bullet lines each as one complete sentence
  then DFY closing sentence (one sentence)
  Each line separated by "\n\n".
- sections.cta must be exactly 4 sentences separated by "\n\n".
- draft_email must concatenate all sections in order with "\n\n" between every paragraph.

INPUT
You will receive a single JSON object with:
- render_spec (required)
- optional constraints / guardrails
- optional evidence_used
Use only that input.
input.userPrompt:
Build the Render Spec (orders) for the downstream writer.

INPUT
Architect output (raw JSON): 
 {
 "render_spec": {
  "meta": {
   "lead_id": "T10_1",
   "selected_angle_id": "angle_opportunity_executive_transition",
   "render_mode": "ANGLE",
   "hedging_required": false
  },
  "content": {
   "hook": "Identifying executives truly ready to transition into franchise ownership is a high-noise sourcing challenge.",
   "situation": "Your franchise model specifically targets seasoned executives transitioning out of corporate roles. The structure supports home-based operations without territory restrictions to lower barriers for individual owners.",
   "implication": "Relying on general networking often misses the specific window when these leaders are liquid and psychologically ready to buy.",
   "bridge": "The goal is to feed your sales pipeline with pre-qualified candidates who match this exact profile.",
   "offer": "We can programmatically source 'Recent Corporate Exits' to fuel your franchise expansion.",
   "details": [
    "We target high-net-worth individuals and recent corporate exits using verified transition data.",
    "We filter for liquidity events and career gaps to find those ready for entrepreneurship.",
    "We launch a dedicated campaign to drive discovery calls for your franchise team."
   ],
   "cta": "Can I send over a few example profiles of executives we could target?"
  }
 }
} 

Person First Name:
 Gino 

TASK
Using ONLY the Architect output above:
- Produce the final rendered email.
- Respect the causal chain:
  Hook → Situation → Implication → Bridge → Contribution → Details → CTA
- Do not add facts, competitors, timelines, or claims.
- Do not change architecture.
- Preserve Offer / Details / CTA templates.
- One sentence per paragraph.
- Spoken, sharp, grounded.

OUTPUT
Return ONLY valid JSON in this exact shape.
No extra keys.
No derived variables.
No field remapping.

output:
{
  "result": {
    "sections": {
      "greeting": "Hi Gino,",
      "hook": "Finding executives truly ready for franchise ownership is noisy.",
      "situation": "Your franchise model specifically targets seasoned executives transitioning out of corporate roles.",
      "implication": "Relying on general networking often misses the window when these leaders are actually ready to buy.",
      "bridge": "The goal is to feed your pipeline with pre-qualified candidates matching this exact profile.",
      "contribution": "If this makes sense, we can get you as many appointments as you want with Recent Corporate Exits to fuel your franchise expansion.",
      "details": "We can do this by:

- Finding and qualifying Recent Corporate Exits at scale

- Automating Deep Research for every Lead to find the best approach for each of them

- Automating Deep Research for every Lead to tailor each approach

- Writing deeply personalized and relevant emails, designed to spark real interest

- Managing all outbound campaigns end-to-end

We'll take care of the whole process, you will just have to close all the new deals.",
      "cta": "If you like the idea, I’d love to show you more details over a quick 10-minute demo.

There, I’ll prepare a sample of 50 leads, all with tailored messages.

That way, you can see the quality of our results first.

If you’re open to it, let me know when it’s the best time for the demo."
    },
    "draft_email": "Hi Gino,

Finding executives truly ready for franchise ownership is noisy.

Your franchise model specifically targets seasoned executives transitioning out of corporate roles.

Relying on general networking often misses the window when these leaders are actually ready to buy.

The goal is to feed your pipeline with pre-qualified candidates matching this exact profile.

We can do this by:

- Automating Deep Research for every Lead to tailor each approach

- Writing deeply personalized and relevant emails, designed to spark real interest

- Managing all outbound campaigns end-to-end

We'll take care of the whole process, you will just have to close all the new deals.

If you like the idea, I’d love to show you more details over a quick 10-minute demo.

There, I’ll prepare a sample of 50 leads, all with tailored messages.

That way, you can see the quality of our results first.

If you’re open to it, let me know when it’s the best time for the demo.",
    "self_check": {
      "one_sentence_per_paragraph": "PASS",
      "no_new_facts": "PASS",
      "competitor_rule": "PASS",
      "time_claim_rule": "PASS",
      "never_print_assumed_tags": "PASS",
      "hook_word_count": "9",
      "contribution_template_ok": "PASS",

    },

  }
}
